631580.name: World to the West - Soundtrack
631580.description:
Original Soundtrack from World to the West, composed by Jørn Lavoll and Linn Kathrin Taklo.

  2. Clony Clones - 01.11

  4. Drumulus Singalongus - 04:47

  6. Huleboer - 04:16
  7. Iced Violin - 03:39
  8. Kattegrotte - 04:06
  9. Knaus in the Jungle - 02:01
  10. Look a Cave - 02:42
  11. Lumina fights the Boss - 02:23
  12. Praline - 03:04
  13. Pre Tychoon Mountain - 02:25
  14. Roboboss - 02:49
  15. Sassy Grassy - 02:55
  16. Small Frozen Bunnies - 04:25
  17. Snakes in the Boss - 02:15
  18. Temple - 04:01
  19. Tiny Cute Bunnies - 02:52
  20. Ukulele of Time - 01:42
  21. Wandering - 01:34
  22. World to the West - End Credits - 02:56
